鯉城.definition: Licheng, a district of Quanzhou City 泉州市[Quan2zhou1 Shi4], Fujian

鯉城區.definition: Licheng, a district of Quanzhou City 泉州市[Quan2zhou1 Shi4], Fujian

鯉魚旗.definition: koinobori, a Japanese carp-shaped windsock flown to celebrate Children's Day

鯉魚跳龍門.definition: to make a significant advance in one's career (idiom); to get one's big break
